scripts.start: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config dist/index.js
scripts.migrate:generate: npm run build && typeorm migration:generate --config dist/data/config/migrations-config.js
scripts.migrate:run: npm run build && typeorm migration:run --config dist/data/config/migrations-config.js
scripts.migrate:revert: npm run build && typeorm migration:revert --config dist/data/config/migrations-config.js
